<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
    <title>404 - arao'blog</title>
    <meta name="description" content="404">
    <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8;"/>
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1" />
    <meta name="robots" content="all" />
    <meta name="robots" content="index,follow"/>
	<style>
		.mod_lost_child{
			width: 100%;
		}
		.mod_lost_child .hd .wrong{
			left: 285px;
		}
		.mod_lost_child .hd .other_info{
			left: 385px;
		}
	</style>
</head>
<body>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://qzonestyle.gtimg.cn/qzone_v6/lostchild/search_children.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
</body>
</html>

Post.title: hexo
Post._content:
## 
1. http://CrazyMilk.github.io
2. master  hexo
3. hexoHexo
4. git clone
``` bash
git clone https://username:password@github.com/CrazyMilk/CrazyMilk.github.io.git
```
5.  CrazyMilk.github.io Git bashnpm install hexohexo initnpm install  npm install hexo-deployer-githexo;
6. _config.ymldeploymaster
7. git add .git commit -m "..."git push origin hexo
8. hexo g -dGitHub
GitHub http://CrazyMilk.github.io hexomaster


## 

1. gitGitHubhexo
```bash
git add .
git commit -m "..."
git push origin hexo
```
2. hexo g -dmaster

## 


1. git clonehexo
``` bash
git clone https://username:password@github.com/CrazyMilk/CrazyMilk.github.io.git
```
2.  CrazyMilk.github.io Git bashhexo init
``` bash
npm install hexo
npm install
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```

Post.title: Spring Boot Starter
Post.content:
Spring BootStarterStarterMavenSpring BootSpring Boot Starter

Maven

Maven

artifactId:

  • springStarterspring-boot-starter-{name}
  • SpringStarter{name}-spring-boot-starter

properties

@ConfigurationPropertiestest

Service

AutoConfigure

  • @Configurationspring

  • @EnableConfigurationProperties(value = TestServiceProperties.class):valuevalue={xxProperties1.class,xxProperteis2.class.}

  • @ConditionalOnClass(TestService.class):classPathTestService.class

  • @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix = test, value = enable, matchIfMissing = true):testenableenable

spring.factories

src/main/resources META-INFMETA-INF spring.factories

SpringBoottest-spring-boot-starter

application.properties

StarterTestService

Post.title: Spring Boot
Post._content:
# ---- Spring Bootclasspath - /static - /public - /resources - /META-INF/resources src/main/resources/statichttp://localhost:8080/D.jpg # ---- Spring Boot - Thymeleaf - FreeMarker - Velocity - Groovy - Mustache ** src/main/resources/templates ** # Thymeleaf ---- ThymeleafXML/XHTML/HTML5WebWeb Spring BootThymeleafsrc/main/resources/templates ```bash org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf ``` ```bash
Name Price
Oranges 0.99
``` # Thymeleaf ---- application.properties ```bash # Enable template caching. spring.thymeleaf.cache=true # Check that the templates location exists. spring.thymeleaf.check-template-location=true # Content-Type value. spring.thymeleaf.content-type=text/html # Enable MVC Thymeleaf view resolution. spring.thymeleaf.enabled=true # Template encoding. spring.thymeleaf.encoding=UTF-8 # Comma-separated list of view names that should be excluded from resolution. spring.thymeleaf.excluded-view-names= # Template mode to be applied to templates. See also StandardTemplateModeHandlers. spring.thymeleaf.mode=HTML5 # Prefix that gets prepended to view names when building a URL. spring.thymeleaf.prefix=classpath:/templates/ # Suffix that gets appended to view names when building a URL. spring.thymeleaf.suffix=.html # Order of the template resolver in the chain. spring.thymeleaf.template-resolver-order= # Comma-separated list of view names that can be resolved. spring.thymeleaf.view-names= ``` # Thymeleaf ---- ```bash @Controller public class HelloController { @RequestMapping("/") public String index(ModelMap map) { // map.addAttribute("host", "http://blog.didispace.com"); // returnsrc/main/resources/templates/index.html return "index"; } } ``` ```bash

Hello World

``` # Spring Security ---- ## Principle(User), Authority(Role)PermissionSpring Security3RolePermissionSpring SecurityAuthorityPermission ## pom.xmlSpring Security ```bash org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-security ``` ## Spring Security Spring SecurityWebSecurityConfig ```java @Configuration @EnableWebSecurity public class WebSecurityConfig extends WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter { @Override protected void configure(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception { http .authorizeRequests() .antMatchers("/", "/home").permitAll() .anyRequest().authenticated() .and() .formLogin() .loginPage("/login") .permitAll() .and() .logout() .permitAll(); } /** * Web: */ @Override public void configure(WebSecurity web) throws Exception { web.ignoring().antMatchers("/js/**", "/css/**", "/images/**"); } /** * Bean */ /*@Override public void configure(AuthenticationManagerBuilder auth) throws Exception { auth.userDetailsService(detailsService).passwordEncoder(new BCryptPasswordEncoder()); }*/ @Autowired public void configureGlobal(AuthenticationManagerBuilder auth) throws Exception { auth .inMemoryAuthentication() .withUser("user").password("password").roles("USER"); } } ``` - @EnableWebSecuritySpring Security - WebSecurityConfigurerAdapterweb - configure(HttpSecurity http) * authorizeRequests()URL//home * formLogin() - configureGlobal(AuthenticationManagerBuilder auth)userpasswordUSER

``` # Thymeleaf ---- application.properties ```bash # Enable template caching. spring.thymeleaf.cache=true # Check that the templates location exists. spring.thymeleaf.check-template-location=true # Content-Type value. spring.thymeleaf.content-type=text/html # Enable MVC Thymeleaf view resolution. spring.thymeleaf.enabled=true # Template encoding. spring.thymeleaf.encoding=UTF-8 # Comma-separated list of view names that should be excluded from resolution. spring.thymeleaf.excluded-view-names= # Template mode to be applied to templates. See also StandardTemplateModeHandlers. spring.thymeleaf.mode=HTML5 # Prefix that gets prepended to view names when building a URL. spring.thymeleaf.prefix=classpath:/templates/ # Suffix that gets appended to view names when building a URL. spring.thymeleaf.suffix=.html # Order of the template resolver in the chain. spring.thymeleaf.template-resolver-order= # Comma-separated list of view names that can be resolved. spring.thymeleaf.view-names= ``` # Thymeleaf ---- ```bash @Controller public class HelloController { @RequestMapping("/") public String index(ModelMap map) { // map.addAttribute("host", "http://blog.didispace.com"); // returnsrc/main/resources/templates/index.html return "index"; } } ``` ```bash

Hello World

``` # Spring Security ---- ## Principle(User), Authority(Role)PermissionSpring Security3RolePermissionSpring SecurityAuthorityPermission ## pom.xmlSpring Security ```bash org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-security ``` ## Spring Security Spring SecurityWebSecurityConfig ```java @Configuration @EnableWebSecurity public class WebSecurityConfig extends WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter { @Override protected void configure(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception { http .authorizeRequests() .antMatchers("/", "/home").permitAll() .anyRequest().authenticated() .and() .formLogin() .loginPage("/login") .permitAll() .and() .logout() .permitAll(); } /** * Web: */ @Override public void configure(WebSecurity web) throws Exception { web.ignoring().antMatchers("/js/**", "/css/**", "/images/**"); } /** * Bean */ /*@Override public void configure(AuthenticationManagerBuilder auth) throws Exception { auth.userDetailsService(detailsService).passwordEncoder(new BCryptPasswordEncoder()); }*/ @Autowired public void configureGlobal(AuthenticationManagerBuilder auth) throws Exception { auth .inMemoryAuthentication() .withUser("user").password("password").roles("USER"); } } ``` - @EnableWebSecuritySpring Security - WebSecurityConfigurerAdapterweb - configure(HttpSecurity http) * authorizeRequests()URL//home * formLogin() - configureGlobal(AuthenticationManagerBuilder auth)userpasswordUSER
